results.code:
618         # Dockerfile - Official MCP server container
619         dockerfile = f"""# Official MCP Server Dockerfile
620 # Multi-stage build for smaller production image
621 FROM python:3.11-slim as builder
622 
623 # Set build arguments
624 ARG BUILD_DATE
625 ARG VERSION=0.1.0
626 
627 # Add metadata
628 LABEL org.opencontainers.image.title="{server_name}"
629 LABEL org.opencontainers.image.description="{description}"
630 LABEL org.opencontainers.image.version=$VERSION
631 LABEL org.opencontainers.image.created=$BUILD_DATE
632 LABEL org.opencontainers.image.source="https://github.com/your-org/{server_name}"
633 LABEL org.opencontainers.image.licenses="MIT"
634 
635 # Install system dependencies
636 RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y \\
637     build-essential \\
638     curl \\
639     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
640 
641 # Install uv for faster dependency management
642 RUN pip install uv
643 
644 # Set up working directory
645 WORKDIR /app
646 
647 # Copy dependency files
648 COPY pyproject.toml ./
649 COPY README.md ./
650 
651 # Install dependencies
652 RUN uv venv && uv pip install -e .
653 
654 # Production stage
655 FROM python:3.11-slim as production
656 
657 # Create non-root user for security
658 RUN groupadd -r mcpuser && useradd -r -g mcpuser mcpuser
659 
660 # Set working directory
661 WORKDIR /app
662 
663 # Copy virtual environment from builder
664 COPY --from=builder /app/.venv /app/.venv
665 
666 # Copy source code
667 COPY src/ ./src/
668 
669 # Set ownership and permissions
670 RUN chown -R mcpuser:mcpuser /app
671 USER mcpuser
672 
673 # Set environment variables
674 ENV PYTHONPATH=/app
675 ENV PATH="/app/.venv/bin:$PATH"
676 ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1
677 ENV LOG_LEVEL=INFO
678 
679 # Health check
680 HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=10s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \\
681     CMD python -c "import sys; sys.exit(0)" || exit 1
682 
683 # Default command (stdio transport)
684 CMD ["python", "src/main.py"]
685 """
686
